page.title: 05Banchory and Oil
page.content: Since the coming of{oil}to the N.E. of Scotland which has made Aberdeen the Oil Capital of Europe the{population} of Banchory has increased greatly. We the pupils of Primary 6/3 decided to conduct a survey to find out what proportion of the school population had parents connected with the oil industry.To do this we split the class into groups which then went round the classrooms asking the following two questions: (a)How many children in the class? (b)How many children have parents in the oil industry? The results were taken back to the classroom and recorded on the board. On adding up the results for (a) we found the number of pupils in the school-715;adding the results for (b) we got the number of children in the school with parents in oil-344,almost half.
